trans-unit.source: Defines a point, associated with an activity execution status change, to be tracked that is in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um ponto, associado a uma alteração de status de execução de atividade, a ser rastreado que está no potencial caminho de execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que altera o status de execução de uma atividade, a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de status de atividade para a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> defines a point of interest in the potential execution path of a workflow, qualified by such an activity status event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> define um ponto de interesse no caminho de execução potencial de um fluxo de trabalho qualificado por um evento de status de atividade desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> contains locations that are included in matching, locations that are excluded from matching, and the data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> contém locais que estão incluídos na correspondência, locais serão excluídos da correspondência e os dados que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You can add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when the specified set of activity status events occur.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> para instruir a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> para o serviço de rastreamento quando ocorrer o conjunto especificado de eventos de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um único <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> pode ser correspondido em vários pontos na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> contains match conditions for a location or locations in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> contém condições de correspondência para um local ou locais no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> to define locations that should be included in matching by the track point.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> para definir os locais que devem ser incluídos na correspondência de pelo ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to define locations that should be excluded from matching by the track point.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> para definir os locais que devem ser excluídos da correspondência pelo ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objetos e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> para especificar os dados que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: The extracted data will be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados extraídos serão incluídos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> para especificar informações adicionais associadas ao ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: These annotations will be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> sent when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Essas anotações serão incluídas o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> enviados quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty track point.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa um ponto de controle vazio.

trans-unit.source: No matching locations, excluded locations, data extracts or annotations are specified.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma correspondência locais, excluídos, extrai dados ou locais anotações são especificadas.

trans-unit.source: You must configure the track point by adding at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve configurar o ponto de controle com a adição de pelo menos um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You may optionally add objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, você pode adicionar objetos a serem <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associada ao ponto de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> sent to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> para especificar as anotações a serem retornados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> enviados para o serviço de controle quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> is empty, no annotations are associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> está vazio, não há anotações são associadas com o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: As anotações são `strings` definir que contêm informações associadas ao ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma anotação pode conter informações sobre o caminho de execução possível o fluxo de trabalho pode levar a partir deste ponto de controle, ou ele pode conter informações a serem exibidas em uma interface de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be excluded from the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de locais que devem ser excluídos do ponto de controle pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection" /> that specifies locations to be excluded from the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection" /> que especifica os locais a serem excluídos do ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: If any <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched for a particular activity status event, the track point will not be matched and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> will be sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se houver <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> é correspondido para um evento de status de uma atividade específica, o ponto de controle não haverá correspondência e não <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> serão enviadas para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is empty, there are no excluded locations.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> está vazio, não existem excluídas localizações.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to specifically exclude locations from being tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> para excluir especificamente locais do rastreamento em tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to track all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities except the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> property of "Code1", you can define an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> that matches all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities and add it to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser controlar todas as <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividades, exceto o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividade com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> propriedade de "Código1", você pode definir um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> que corresponde a todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividades e adicioná-lo ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Then you can define another <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> that matches <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> property set to "Code1" and add it to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode definir outro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> que corresponda <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividades com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> propriedade definida como "1" e adicioná-lo ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The track point will then match all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities except the "Code1" activity.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de controle, em seguida, corresponderá a todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividades, exceto a atividade de "Código1".

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies data to be extracted from the workflow instance and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que especifica os dados a ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho e enviados para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection" /> that specifies the data to be extracted and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection" /> que especifica os dados a ser extraído e enviados para o serviço de controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando um ponto de controle for correspondido, a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução pode extrair dados da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates the extracted data in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> objects that it puts in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução encapsula os dados extraídos em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> objetos que ele coloca no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A> do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> que ele envia para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> is empty, no data will be extracted.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> está vazia, nenhum dado será extraído.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity associated with this track point, and you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> para especificar dados de membro que devem ser extraídos da atividade associados a esse ponto de controle e, em seguida, você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> para especificar dados de membro que devem ser extraídos da atividade do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be included in matching for the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de locais que devem ser incluídos na correspondência do ponto de controle pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection" /> that specifies the locations to be matched for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection" /> que especifica os locais a serem correspondidos para o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> is empty, the track point cannot be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> está vazio, o ponto de controle não pode ser correspondido pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> to participate in matching.
trans-unit.target: Você deve adicionar pelo menos um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> para participar na correspondência.

trans-unit.source: The track point will be matched if any <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> is matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de controle será correspondido se houver <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> for correspondida pelo tempo de execução de rastreamento infraestrutura e não <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> for correspondida.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates accessing the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o acesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the TrackingProfileDesigner SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é da amostra TrackingProfileDesigner SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo criador de perfil do controle](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
